comment: If you have to take Professor Mixon, I highly recommend making this class your top priority because she is very strict. She does not accept any late work without prior approval—no matter what!! Make sure you email her several days in advance, as she takes a while to respond, and when she does, her replies tend to be passive-aggressive..

Hugest waste of time and feels like material wasn't prior planned. Lots of busy work and be ready to answer questions because she won't move on until everyone contributes, she'll just stare and wait. She's very passive aggressive when you ask questions she's previously answered and never answers emails. I did not learn anything in this class.

Anna Mixon was such a kind person. Her class was fairly easy, and she genuinely cares about all of her students. She wanted to make sure we had enough time to complete every assignment and she did not want to stress us out. She is so understanding and will allow extensions as long as you communicate with her.

The class was easy, but she never responds to emails, she graded very last minute and does not offer clear feedback. Her class is very time wasting and I did not learn anything from her class. Would not recommend!

An overall time waster. Easy content and assignments, but get ready to be bored out of your mind every single class. Very low energy classes, and her methods of teaching can be extremely frustrating at times. I would not take Mixon again
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Professor Mixon was so sweet. She was always willing to work with students and gave extensions on assignments when she could tell we were overwhelmed with other classes. She always gave useful things that we could use in our classroom and I really respected that.

Professor Mixon is wonderful. She really gives you information that you will want to use when you are a teacher. I've learned so much in her class. You have partner projects, group projects, and you come in and do a fun warmup that pertains with what you will be learning that day. Highly recommend if you want to learn great material!!
